mapper.insert: insert into board (subject, content, writer, regdate, modidate, count) values(#{subject},#{content},#{writer},#{regdate},#{modidate},#{count})
mapper.select: select orderd_board.* FROM( SELECT * FROM board order by postno ) as orderd_board ORDER BY postno desc LIMIT #{startIndex}, #{cntPerPage}
mapper.update: update board set count = count + 1 where postno=#{postno}
update board set subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, modidate=NOW() where postno=#{postno}
mapper.select: select orderd_board.* FROM( SELECT * FROM board WHERE writer like concat('%',#{writer},'%') order by postno ) as orderd_board ORDER BY postno desc LIMIT #{criteria.startIndex}, #{criteria.cntPerPage}
select count(*) from board where writer like concat('%',#{writer},'%')
